Job Description: Experience: 0 2 Years of working experience with Python.   Job Description:   We are looking for a Python developer to join our growing data science team. As part of it youll work with our data engineers to help in building modules and algorithms. Responsibilities:  As a Python Developer ,  you will create and expand our in - house tools that adapts to quickly evolving business requirements. Ability to work in a rapid environment and convert high - level design into high quality python code.  To always listen to data. Your ideas to be taken seriously and valued. To be working with bleeding edge tech. What we are looking for:     Fluency in Python and experience architecting large applications with good knowledge of programming concepts and object - oriented programming. Self - starting and can work autonomously in a team. Committed to following best practices. Able to learn quickly and take on new responsibilities as priorities change. Organized and detail - oriented. Strong Linux skills. Knowledge of Pandas and SciPy / NumPy (a plus).
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Computers
PG: M.Tech in Computers, MCA in Computers
